img_text: Healing One Laver at a Time I would cry myself to sleep with deep, soulful, bed shaking tears. How could grownups do what they did to me? A Survivor's Surrender Having a stuffed animal to hold onto at night meant the difference between my wanting to awaken the next morning or not. I held the rabbit in a death grip Healing One Layer at a Time Jackson Hanks JacksonHANKS.com
